bugtrap03.model

Class DataModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • bugtrap03.model.DataModel

  • public class DataModel
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the main controller of the system.

      • getUserListOfExactType

        public <U extends User> purecollections.PList<U> getUserListOfExactType(java.lang.Class<U> userType)
        Get the list of users in this system who have the exact class type userType.
        Type Parameters:
        U - extends User type.
        Parameters:
        userType - The type of users returned.
        Returns:
        All users of this system who have the exact class type userType.

      • getUserListOfType

        public <U extends User> purecollections.PList<U> getUserListOfType(java.lang.Class<U> userType)
        Get the list of users in this system who are of type that is or extends userType.
        Type Parameters:
        U - extends User type.
        Parameters:
        userType - The type of users returned.
        Returns:
        All users of this system who have the exact class type userType or a class type that extends userType.

        public Project createProject(java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,
                             java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
                             Developer lead,
                             long budget,
                             User creator)
                      throws PermissionException

        Parameters:
        name - The name of the project
        description - The description of the project
        startDate - The start date of the project
        budget - The budget estimate for this project
        lead - The lead developer of this project
        Returns:
        the created project
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the constructor of project fails
        PermissionException - If the given creator has insufficient permissions

                             User user,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             java.lang.String description,

                             java.lang.Long budgetEstimate)

        description - The new description of the given project
        startDate - The new startDate of the given project
        budgetEstimate - The new budget estimate of the given project

        public Subsystem createSubsystem(User user,
                                 AbstractSystem abstractSystem,
                                 java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String description)
                          throws PermissionException

        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to create the subsystem
        abstractSystem - The Project/Subsystem to add the new subsytem to
        name - The name of the new Subsytem
        description - The description of the new Subsytem
        Returns:
        The created subsytem
        Throws:

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(User user,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies,
                                 Subsystem subsystem)
                          throws PermissionException
        This method creates a bug report in the system
        Parameters:
        user - The User that wants to create this bug report
        title - The title of the bugReport
        description - The description of the bugReport
        dependencies - The depended bug reports of this bug report
        subsystem - The subsystem this bug report belongs to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreator(creator) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidTitle(title) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDescription(description) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDependencies(dependencies) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidSubSystem(subsystem) fails
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permission to create a bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidCreator(User), BugReport.isValidTitle(String), BugReport.isValidDescription(String), BugReport.isValidDependencies(PList), BugReport.isValidSubsystem(Subsystem), BugReport.getNewUniqueID()

      • createBugReport

        public BugReport createBugReport(User user,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 java.util.GregorianCalendar calendar,
                                 purecollections.PList<BugReport> dependencies,
                                 Subsystem subsystem)
                          throws PermissionException
        This method creates a bug report in the system
        Parameters:
        user - The User that wants to create this bug report
        title - The title of the bugReport
        description - The description of the bugReport
        calendar - The creationDate of the bugReport
        dependencies - The depended bug reports of this bug report
        subsystem - The subsystem this bug report belongs to
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreator(creator) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidUniqueID(uniqueID) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidTitle(title) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDescription(description) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidCreationDate(creationDate) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidDependencies(dependencies) fails
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if isValidSubSystem(subsystem) fails
        PermissionException - if the given creator doesn't have the needed permission to create a bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidCreator(User), BugReport.isValidUniqueID(long), BugReport.isValidTitle(String), BugReport.isValidDescription(String), BugReport.isValidCreationDate(GregorianCalendar), BugReport.isValidDependencies(PList), BugReport.isValidSubsystem(Subsystem), BugReport.getNewUniqueID()

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(User user,
                             BugReport bugReport,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method creates a comment on a given BugReport
        Parameters:
        user - The creator of the comment
        bugReport - The bug report to create the comment on
        text - The text of the new comment
        Returns:
        The new generated comment
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given User doesn't have the permission to create the comment
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given comment is not valid for this bug report
        See Also:
        BugReport.isValidComment(Comment)

      • createComment

        public Comment createComment(User user,
                             Comment comment,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws PermissionException
        This method creates a comment on the given comment with the given text by the given user
        Parameters:
        user - The creator of the new comment
        comment - The comment to create the comment on (= sub comment)
        text - The text of the new Comment
        Returns:
        The new generated comment
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given User doesn't have the permission to create the comment
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the given parameters are not valid for this comment
        See Also:
        Comment.isValidSubComment(Comment)

      • cloneProject

        public Project cloneProject(Project cloneSource,
                            VersionID versionID,
                            Developer lead,
                            java.util.GregorianCalendar startDate,
                            long budgetEstimate)
        Clone the given Project and set a few attributes.
        Parameters:
        cloneSource - The project to clone from.
        versionID - The versionID for the clone project.
        lead - The lead developer for the clone project.
        startDate - The startDate for the clone project.
        budgetEstimate - The budgetEstimate for the clone project.
        Returns:
        The resulting clone. Null if the source Clone is null. //TODO remove @see //TODO add @throws
        See Also:
        Project.cloneProject(bugtrap03.bugdomain.VersionID, bugtrap03.bugdomain.usersystem.Developer, java.util.GregorianCalendar, long)

      • getDeveloperInProject

        public purecollections.PList<Developer> getDeveloperInProject(BugReport bugRep)
        This method returns all the developers associated with the project the bug report belongs to
        Parameters:
        bugRep - The bug report
        Returns:
        The list of all devs in the project
        See Also:
        BugReport.getSubsystem(), AbstractSystem.getAllDev()

      • addUsersToBugReport

        public void addUsersToBugReport(User user,
                                BugReport bugRep,
                                purecollections.PList<Developer> devList)
                         throws PermissionException
        This method adds all the users of the given list to the given project by the given user
        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to add all the given developers to the bug report
        bugRep - The bug report to add all the developers to
        devList - The developers to add to the bug report
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the given user doesn't have the needed permission to add users to the given bug report
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given user was null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given developer was not valid for this bug report

      • getAllTags

        public purecollections.PList<Tag> getAllTags()
        This method return a PList of all the possible tags that can be set.
        Returns:
        a Plist of all the possible tags

      • setTag

        public void setTag(BugReport bugrep,
                   Tag tag,
                   User user)
            throws PermissionException
        This method lets the given user set the tag of the given bug report to the given tag
        Parameters:
        bugrep - The bug report of which the tag gets to be set
        tag - The given tag to set
        user - The user that wishes to set the tag
        Throws:
        PermissionException - If the user doesn't have the needed permission to set the given tag to the bug report
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given tag isn't a valid tag to set to the bug report

                                   BugReport bugRep)
                            throws PermissionException

        Parameters:
        user - The user that wants to inspect the bugReport
        bugRep - The bug report that the user wants to inspect
        Returns:

      • assignToProject

        public void assignToProject(Project project,
                            User user,
                            Developer developer,
                            Role role)
                     throws PermissionException
        This method let's a user assign a role to a developer in a given project .
        Parameters:
        project - The project in which the user will be assigned.
        user - The user that assigns the role to the dev
        developer - The developer that gets a role assigned
        role - The role that will be assigned
        Throws:
        PermissionException - if the user doesn't have the needed permission.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given role was null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given user is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the given project was null
